General.Name: Manhattan Corp Ltd
General.Description: Manhattan Corporation Limited engages in the evaluation, exploration, and development of mineral projects in Australia. The company explores for uranium and gold. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Tibooburra Gold project comprising 15 granted exploration licenses covering an area of approximately 2,200 square kilometers located in the Koonenberry Gold District, New South Wales. The company is based in West Perth, Australia.
